newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar ends firm on CenBnk intervention.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar ends firm on CenBnk intervention.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar firmed to end the day at 473.75/475.00 per dollar, buoyed by Central Bank dollar sales, traders said.
On Wednesday, the unit closed at 474.25/475.25 per dollar.
"It was a quiet day, with little demand," said one trader.
"The Bank was quiet in the morning, but came in strong in the afternoon, firming the exchange rate to where it closed," he added.
While dealers saw busier trade, they agreed on the Bank's participation. "There was plenty of demand for the dollars which the Bank supplied as necessary," said one.
